name: Wild League
description:
I'm a fan of clash royale and I have a long time playing this game, but after some years playing, I would really like to see how things could be different and how different kinds of strategy and card types could work, so I started creating Wild League.

This game aims to be an alternative to strategy card games in desktop and focus on fast gameplays giving the player opportunities to try different strategies and creating your own way to play the game.

Stay in touch

On my Blog where I often post devlogs and updates about the game.

Also on twitter where I post polls about what should be in the game and threads about the current game development.
